name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp Web™ Open SideBar in Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsApp Web Extensions For Chrome. WhatsApp Web™ and Open SideBar in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WhatsApp Web Extensions For Chrome. WhatsApp Web™ and Open SideBar in Chrome

If you want to constantly check WhatsApp while completing your work with the browser, this add-on is for you. 

It can always show the WhatsApp application on the right side. You can easily track the WhatsApp application.
